participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and enthusiastic, Emily loves sharing her passion for learning with her students.
participant_1.background: My parents were also teachers. For vacation, I enjoy time at the beach. I am an elementary school teacher. My favorite band is up and I got to see them in concert once.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and cheerful, Jake is always excited to explore new ideas and loves to express himself through music.
participant_2.background: I love to go to Disney World every year. I am in the third grade. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1 and I'm an elementary school teacher.
Hi, my name is participant_2 and I'm in the third grade.
That's great! I love working with kids.
Me too! I love learning new things.
What's your favorite subject in school?
I like math and science.
Those are great subjects! I'm a big fan of math myself.
Me too! What's your favorite math problem?
I like word problems. They're a lot of fun to figure out.
Me too! I like to use math to solve real-world problems.
That's a great way to think about math.
Thanks! I'm also good at singing songs from the movie Frozen.
That's awesome! I love Frozen too.
Me too! I love to sing "Let It Go" and "Do You Want to Build a Snowman?"
Those are great songs! I love to sing them too.
We should start a band together!
That would be fun! We could call ourselves "The Frozen Singers."
That's a great name! We could perform at Disney World.
That would be awesome! We could sing "Let It Go" on stage in front of Mickey Mouse.
That would be amazing! I can't wait!
